channel.title: Need help with 317 weapons
channel.description: I NEED HELP FIXING THE DAMAGE FOR A FEW WEAPONS AND FIXING D CLAWS BECAUSE D CLAWS ONLY DOES 1 RED DAMAGE AND ALL THE REST ARE 0'S

item.title: Need help with 317 weapons
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

There are a few things you can do in this situation. For the spec, just edit the spec in the client.java. If you’re wanting to edit the strength bonus, then go to Item.cfg and search for the weapon or the weapon ID and change the strength bonus, or whatever else you’re wanting to change.

Read full topic
